ygData.subject: Re: Warbones are shaman research items
ygData.msgSnippet: Warbone chips come off skels in Unrest I belive off knight and barbed bones.  They sell for 3 gold (so let
ygData.messageBody:
<< Where do you get the warbone chips from? >>

Warbone chips come off skels in Unrest I belive off knight and barbed
bones. They sell for 3 gold (so let everyone give them to you in unrest)
just smile say thank you.
The bones will do NOTHING for your pets , they are a shaman alchemy
componets.
I have tested this back when I was a youngin like this : Drop all your
bones in bank, put warbone in inventory, cast pet, nothing but a message,
you dont have bone chips.
It nice thought to collect them and people feel in unrest they must give us
all bones.
I had 2 backpacks full of bones after a marathon basement camp (30-35 this
place rocks in a group you own basement) so many bones i was destroying them
by the 20's. No other necro in Unrest and I didnt have the heart to tell
party to stop giving me bones.

Zakrell Lu'Dan
Tunare
